messages.subject: Karri - candy
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hi Karri. We have this issue also. One thing I have done (not sure if it s available in your area) is shop online. There is a grocery store about 35
messages.messageBody:
At 08:45 AM 1/14/2005 +0000, you wrote:
>My problem is the darn candy. I try not to keep so much in the house,
> > but lately there has been and she eats it a lot on some days.


Hi Karri. We have this issue also. One thing I have done (not sure if it's
available in your area) is shop online. There is a grocery store about 35
minutes from me that will do your shopping and bring the bags out to your
car. You just make your order online and drive up to the store and give
them your credit card. This even helps *me* to resist temptation that is
all over the mainstream stores. We get our meat from a delivery service and
go to a whole food store, then other items we get with the online shopping.


"Do or do not. There is no try."
-- Yoda

Shannon Entin, entinfamily@...
Low Carb Living, Scrapbooking & Homeschooling at www.ShannonEntin.com
Family updates at www.TheEntins.com
